price: 不信正道而且多行不义的人，安拉不致于赦宥他们，也不致于指引他们任何道路；
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَظَلَمُواْ لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا لِيَهۡدِيَهُمۡ طَرِيقًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waẓalamū lam yakuni al-lahu liyaghfira lahum walā liyahdiyahum ṭarīqan
